response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a perfect match for your needs, considering its worth of $1,200,000 to you. I am offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $950,000. This offer represents a substantial saving compared to its intrinsic value and provides you with an excellent opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing the details with you further.", "product_price": 950000}
